ygData.subject: Thanks and more questions...Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: Windleaf, Sylly, B, Thanks for your help on the quest.  I am in SK now and plan just to run over to Queynos and take a trip to Erudin while I am not in Kunark.
ygData.messageBody:
Windleaf, Sylly, B,

Thanks for your help on the quest. I am in SK now and plan just to run over
to Queynos and take a trip to Erudin while I am not in Kunark. Also, thanks
for sharing your kite areas. I am just starting to do OT and find it works
pretty well there, too.

So, my next question - just keeping the list active =). I have some
Lambent(Helm, gauntlets and bracer) and plan to get the rest. Yeah, varied
opinions on if it is the "best" armor for us, but I want to at least have
the look for a while. My query is on options on my other armor - cloak,
rings, earrings, neck, face, etc. I have a jagged band, a +7 Cha ring, a
splintered bronze cloak, 2 oppoline Cha earrings and some + Cha necklace,
Splitpaw maybe. I have been lucky in FM and have used pp from my two loops
to purchase a MM drum (800) and currently have my remaining stash (1300ish)
burning a hole in my pocket. I have most of the gems already for my
Lambent, so I don't need to spend for them. My weapons are Obsidian Shard,
Pugius, Dragoon Dirk in range slot and I use Gnoll Hide whips to keep up 1HS
and use for stunning casters. Lately, I have been using the shard in my
primary hand and the whip in my off hand - fun to burn and stun at the same
time - that's when I use weapons at all as my melee does not compare(as we
all know). I really want to upgrade my cloak and maybe my neck, but if you
have other suggestions for my other slots, please share them with me(face
WILL be the mask one day). Include your opinion of ball park value(I know
it varies server to server) and where I could find it if I just traveled
there(assuming I can camp there or maybe I can do it in my future) and any
stats you can remember. Again, thanks in advance.

Piemur Draggonsinger
Wood Elf Bard of the 34 Songs
Officer of Unity of Spirits
The Nameless
